## R Markdown


```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)

html <- read_html("https://www.basketball-reference.com/players/w/westbru01/gamelog/2021")
tables <- html %>% html_nodes("table") %>% html_table()

df <- tables[8] %>% data.frame()

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
names(df)

df$date <- as.Date(df$Date, c("%Y-%m-%d"))
df$points <- as.integer(df$PTS)
```


## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
qplot(df$date, df$point)

```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
